overview: Councilor Sven Ersson and Farmer Jan Hansson has been bitter enemies for several years. Sven's neighbour Ola in Gyllby has a daughter Britta. The perfect partner for Sven's son Erik. But Erik only have eyes for Anna. The daughter of Jan Hansson. Unaware of the hostility between the families, Erik has asked Anna to marry him.
